overview: Murni wants to be ronggeng but she doesn't want tradition  to serve men keep going. With the help of Pandu, her  educated little friend, they try  lying to the public that Murni has opened  "kelambu" with him. But the lie doesn't work  smooth when she rejects other men who want to sleep  with her and made all the citizens turn around  insulted her. This made Pandu expelled, they thought  educated people are against the culture and both of them  finally separated.
title: Kelambu
